types.feat: New features that users can perceive
types.build: Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies (scope examples: gulp, broccoli, npm)

scopeDescriptions: It can optionally be anything that specifies the location of the commit change.
For example, $ location, $ browser, $ compile, $ rootScope, ngHref, ngClick, ngView.
In app development, a scope is a page, module, or component.
invalidScopeDescriptions: `scope` is optional, but cannot be empty if parentheses are present.
subjectDescriptions: A very short description of the changes in one line.
invalidSubjectDescriptions: Do not capitalize the first letter
